attributes.action: Give A Knighthood To Harry Kane and Jordon Pickford For services to sport.
attributes.additional_details:
“Harry the hero" was how Gary Lineker described Harry Kane's performance against Tunisia

Shearer: "We went after Tunisia and our passing was so crisp whether it was short or long. We got the first goal and I thought 'here we go'."

He isn’t just good, he is outstanding, truly.
attributes.background:
Harry Edward Kane is an English professional footballer who plays as a striker for Premier League club Tottenham Hotspur and captains the England national team.

Jordan Pickford is an English professional footballer who plays as a goalkeeper in the Premier League club and the English national team

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
